Navigation
Name CompareWithOtherParadigms
Details ASFPlusSDF OO
Description Rascal provides both familiar and unfamiliar features. These will be appreciated differently by programmers that are expert in other language paradigms. We provide the following comparisons:

  • ASFPlusSDF: Rascal explained for ASF+SDF programmers.
  • OO: Rascal explained for OO and imperative programmers.
